title: FS: 1888 N29 Allen & Ginter Buck Ewing

posts.post_title: FS: 1888 N29 Allen & Ginter Buck Ewing
posts.post_content:
Excellent eye appeal on this A&G Ewing. $1900 shipped PPFF. Thanks!

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2ny7zS5][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52215597132_c32f0475ea.jpg[/img][/url] [url=https://flic.kr/p/2ny7zQm][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52215597032_5256bd8b37.jpg[/img][/url]

nice looking card.

look good in someones collection especially for the pre 1900 collections
Thanks, Jeff. It’s a real looker for the grade.
How come the first photo doesn't have a Certification number and the photos below do? Or am I missing something?

[quote name="daniel.1983" post=2243586]How come the first photo doesn't have a Certification number and the photos below do? Or am I missing something?[/QUOTE]

Good eye. I digitally remove the cert numbers of cards I post on Instagram. Tired of seeing cards I own show up on eBay listed by fraudulent sellers.
